outline:
1. envoy, messenger
  2. pivot of door, hinge
  3. pang, distress
kjv_def: ambassador, hinge, messenger, pain, pang, sorrow. Compare H6736 (צִיר).
strongs_def: a hinge (as pressed in turning); also a throe (as a phys. or mental pressure); also a herald or erranddoer (as constrained by the principal)
